Reviews.Title: Fits well in your pocket, but the touchscreen is sometimes hard to handle
Reviews.Author: arik leeb
Reviews.Content: This was my first smartphone. The apps of the android system are great, but if you download many of them your system is likely to crash a lot. The touchscreen may be cool at first, but sometimes simple tasks such as dialing or saving a number may become annoying, especially if the system gets slower and slower due to apps. The battery life is not too good. I have to recharge the phone daily even if I didn't make a long phone call. I am satisfied with the camera, which produces very good photos in my opinion. What makes this phone great is its size, look and the camera. Although the size makes this phone pretty handy, the touchscreen and the system may not be very convenient especially for basic usage such as phone calls and sms. All in all, I still like it but I think I should have bought the version with integrated keypad.

Reviews.Title: Fits  in your 5th pocket of your jeans.
Reviews.Author: GadgetGirl
Reviews.Content: The phone is really a nice size in the world , bigger is always better.Set up with ATT was automatic. Everything worked perfect. It fit easy in the 5th pocket of the jeans, even sideways, testing was a snap after installing a free keyboard(hate T9) the battery was excellent 2-3 days easy with normal use, my Aria could not get even one day.Pictures are very sharp and clear, much nicer then my iphone4, sound is great and reception was awesome always had at least 3 bars out of 4.All around a great phone, however I love phones and sent it back for a newer toy.I would buy this phone again, in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: Complete and Tinny
Reviews.Author: Demian
Reviews.Content: If you are tired of the big new fashion handsets, this one is for your.  Complete and small.  Be carefull if your fingers are too big....

Reviews.Title: Excellent Android Phone
Reviews.Author: Gerard Valere
Reviews.Content: Simply excellent, very responsive to touch, easy to setup (mind you I am a computer geek, your mileage may vary)the Good -1) Small2) wifi and bluetooth enabled3) Easy to connect to the net and install apps via the wifi4) Google, Facebook, Youtube etc already setup and easy to access5) Good quality camera6) Good quality screen7) Screen protector included8) Decent music quality with the included headphones9) Comes with 2GB memory card!the Bad -1) Charger included is a bit clunky (got around this by using my PC to charge it instead)2) Small!Recommended apps - Angry Birds!:-)

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Yaqi
Reviews.Content: this phone is really good. especially the camera.But I have to charge the phone every day.anyway I like this phone so much

Reviews.Title: Great smart phone... cute size
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my sister. I tried it for a day and really got hooked to it.Although it lacks the full qwerty keyboard, the on-screen keyboard is really easy to use.This little thing is packed with all the android goodies and a great camera.Sony's timescape is the icing on the cake.If you are someone who doesn't want to sign a 2yr contract with your operator, but still want to try out the Android platform, you might want to go in for something like the xperia mini or xperia mini pro.

Reviews.Title: A good phone.
Reviews.Author: Vivek
Reviews.Content: Now... yes this phone does NOT have a great battery life with one having to charge the battery everyday. But that is not all about this great device. First of all it has to be its size which will make you wonder... can this thing carry of so many features.. and trust me.. it does and very easily at that.The good news is that SE has released the Android 2.1 update for this phone.. so a major problem of no bluetooth file transfer has been solved. The phone has an in-built memory of 128 MB which is kinda enough for the apps.. for me at least. The battery can be optimised with a few intelligent settings changes.. like keeping the background data off if you are not using the internet all the time.One reviewer said that this phone doesnt have the Android Market app... which is basically not true. This phone does have the app and it works like a breeze. Most apps work flawlessly keeping in mind the small screen and its limitations.You would either love this phone or hate it. I love it for the whole effort behind to produce something new, something out of the mould. Yes, for this design you would have to live with certain limitations.. but then, im not a great texter in the first place. And I have my laptop with me all the time to send emails if extremely necessary!!So I would definitely vote for this phone.

Reviews.Title: Very Small Great Features
Reviews.Author: emmericdel
Reviews.Content: HiWell the description says it all it is ver VERY small but is very VERY impresive all the aplications and features that this smartphone can present to you camera is good wi fi 3G all seems to be very good the problem is the size after a while you start felling some pain in your hands trying to figure it out how to hold it but thats the reason why they called mini my wife love it and it seems that once you get the hang of it all come together

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Just awful. Among other things the battery life is terrible; full charge required every day on even the lightest of use with lowest brightness. You'll need to grab Advanced Task Killer to kill off all the apps which run processes in the background pretty much nonstop if unchecked. Another incredibly annoying feature is that, even when the screen timeout is set to NEVER, the screens still times out during calls and thus there is no way to hang up quickly which can be very awkward. I hate this phone but I'm stuck with it for another ten months.

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: Kayleen Moore
Reviews.Content: This phone would get stuck on your last call and excessively call that person over and over again. Takes forever to turn on when it does decide to come on. Just the worst thing I ever bought

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Erick
Reviews.Content: My girl friend bought it a long time ago, the cell phone is great, excellent brand, the best of this phone and all Sony phones are the camera

Reviews.Title: A very nice cell
Reviews.Author: vincenzo
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone some weeks ago and I wanted to see how it worked in the 'long distance'. I did not know this particular model (in Italy I have never seen it) and I was looking for a simple, very portable and with good performance as a camera cell phone. This model make very well all this duties.If I have to find just a little problem, I had some difficulties at the beginning in typing numbers or using calculator because the screen is really little (and my hand is rather big:-)), but it is just a matter of practice and you it really fits in every pocket of the shirt or of the jeans and is very light.All in all a very good purchase!

Reviews.Title: telefono muy completo
Reviews.Author: Norman Barrios
Reviews.Content: Fue un regalo para mi esposa el cual le agrado totalmente hasta ahora hemos visto que  es ecpnomico y muy completo

Reviews.Title: Very good!!
Reviews.Author: Erodes Berbetz
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very good quality, amazing fit and finish! My daugther loved it. It came in a very nice colour and works perfectly. Very good cost/benefit ratio.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: GUASON
Reviews.Content: ITS A VERY GOOD PHONE. SMALL BUT USEFULL. ITS PERFECT FOR SMALL POCKETS. TAKE NICE PHOTOS AND HAS A POWERFULLY FLASH

Reviews.Title: Excelente Compra
Reviews.Author: Masterjack05
Reviews.Content: Excelente equipo, muy buenas condiciones; liberado, funciona perfectamente en Venezuela; Cámara de 5MP con Flash, facil de usar, pantalla comoda....!!!! MUY BUENO

Reviews.Title: No Pink Case
Reviews.Author: felly1089
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed when i did not see my pink case, it came with the white. Other than that i love my phone... I downloaded a qwerty keypad app and so i dont have to use the 3tap keyboard. This little phone is really one for the books. I love it and I've only had it for one day. Alot to learn but i'm so excited. All in all i would recommend this phone, its small but once your hands are small its pretty easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto
Reviews.Author: SANTIAGO
Reviews.Content: El producto comprado satisface las expectativas relacionadas al mismo es versatil, en relación al tiempo de entrega fue de acuerdo al compromiso establecido... Recomiendo ejecutar esta compra...¡¡

Reviews.Title: Wrong version!!!
Reviews.Author: RicardoSP55
Reviews.Content: The article says "Xperia X10 mini E10i", but the seller sent me a "Xperia X10 mini E10a". I was interested in having the "E10i" because some service provider in my country uses the 900 band, but the "E10a" isn't able to work in that band. After almost a week, I've received answer from the seller, but I'm from Venezuela, so I don't really think there is a way to exchange it.About the phone itself, I think it's pretty cool. I think the best is the small size, it's very practical!

Reviews.Title: Good phone, good price
Reviews.Author: Gerald "gjpv"
Reviews.Content: I am an android phone user for over 2 years with the X8. I bought the X10 for my wife last year and she is very satisfied with it. I had her download OSMAND navigation app in the market and she uses it on OFFLINE mode, no data charges whatsoever. The only drawback is the small screen, but for its low price, it is what one gets.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: reirei
Reviews.Content: i love this cell phone it does the job although it has some ups and downs its been a great phone....

Reviews.Title: one of the best phones I owned
Reviews.Author: AMT
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone more than a year ago and works perfectly, I have many android apps. My favorite is Aldiko which allow me carry my books and looks great. I use it to do FB and Twitter as well as review my e-mail, the screen is a little small to actually navigate in internet but in this size you can{t have all. For those who are used to use predictive text to send SMS its OK but those who prefer a full keyboard this is not the phone, actually it is the only weakness of the X10 mini I did not get why does not have a full on screen touch keyboard. What really surprised me is the quality of the video which is great, the camera is also good.

Reviews.Title: i loved it
Reviews.Author: Xomeone
Reviews.Content: So im going to be quick.Problems with the shipping? : no, i got it on time. Even tho i had to pay for the 2 days shipping thing because i was leaving the USA.Problems with the way i got it? : no, it was really nicely with all the box and everything BUT, i was EXTREMELY dissappointed with the fact that it says : white / pink and i ONLY got the white case :S and it was obviously on the phone...!No pink case ANYWHERE.Problems with the phone : well, yeah, everything everybody is saying: the battery dies super fast, i have to put it to charge daily.It gets hot when its charging. ...The texting thing is awful because its like the old phone kind of thing, u have to type the same box for abc and stuff like that, just like the old phones. but u get used to it, im used to it now.Somethin i didnt know : u cant get the battery out, so if it ever dies because of the battery its not like u could say, oh well, im going to buy another battery, no way. u cant remove that battery by urself.but i love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone!!
Reviews.Author: C. A. Valerio "Cali"
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this phone for my girlfriend, and it is pretty nice, it works fine and has a lot of features.It came only with pink case, but that is not a big deal.The battery life is only one day or less, but it charges very fast!It came with 2GB memory card, charger, USB cable, and headphones.Now there is a problem with our operator! Our 3G works at 850Mhz! and this phone supports only 900Mhz and 1200Hz, so basically we are using this phone as 2G. That's a very important thing to mention on the advise.Now I know there is another version that works at 850!! :S

Reviews.Title: A very good mobile
Reviews.Author: angelo
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a colleague of mine who asked for a pocket and fashion mobile (I am a satisfied owner of Motorola Droid); leaving aside the initial difficulties in setting the phone I received (the factory setup was for the Chinese market!) and, in particular, the difficulty to change the electronic keyboard and the connected Chinese vocabulary (initially, I downloaded a free android keyboard from the market - along with the Italian dictionary - then I realised the possibility to use the Italian sony-ericsson electronic keyboard by long pressing the text space....)it is a nice mobile, with a good balance quality/price, and I strongly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: LITTLE MONSTER
Reviews.Author: GUSTAVO GONZALEZ
Reviews.Content: Ok, let's say it's not an Iphone, it's not Samsung's Galaxy either, but this little tiny toy can do almost everything. I bought this item as a gift for my girlfriend and have handle it for a couple of days and I'm definitely very very impressed. I'm sure Android is the future for mobile phones OS.  Never had a cheaper phone as good as this. Just add a 16 GB Micro SD Memory Card and you'll be done.  Tons of aplications to install from Android Market, GPS, 5 megapixels camera, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, smooth touch screen flow and many many other features. Battery life is probably it's only bad one but if  charging every day is not a problem you'll do well. I'm sure I will buy another soon.  Try it!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing cell phone
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Linhares
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best Android's phone on the market nowadays.It's really easy to manage and very portable.A good choice for any person. I am loving mine. :)

Reviews.Title: Really great for small people!
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. I can install a lot of apps but too much will make the phone lag and do crappy stuff like any computer. I say get a lot of Gb space. I have it for a while now and it still works beautifully. if you have big hands, i recommend that you get the regular size version of this phone because it will be a pain to text or access applications.. or use the phone overall. you can always download a textpad for this phone instead of using its regular one. thats what i did.umm. the battery is not too great. i charge it every night. its not a problem to charge daily. the phone number buttons (the main function of the phone) is kinda a hassle to reach sometimes. oh, i find that the screen usually locks itself when i talk to someone and when i want to hang up, i have to UNLOCK IT and click on the "phone, calling button" to reach the main page of the phone to actually click disconnect button. i'm trying to make sense but I'm not sure if i sound all that correct.Music player works fine, pictures are perfect. quality is great. wifi works. i say this phone is really good. The image is GREAT. The look of this phone is adorable and people don't believe me when i say its phone. its so small, it looks like an mp3 player in a way. With this phone, you will always get comments and compliments. It's a looker alright.The touch is VERY responsive. its sensitive. i dont have to actually press hard on the touch screen at all. the back of the phone, you can change it to ANY color. its cool! keeps your phone fresh looking and new all the time. of course, you need to have different colors.i say, its meant to last! so get it!

Reviews.Title: Low-functional
Reviews.Author: ms.sassy
Reviews.Content: The phone is "cute" in style, however the battery life is horrible. I have had problems with receiving calls and texts. It won't allow me to go online even though I pay for the service. I haven't been able to do any picture texting as well. This product is too expensive for what it is suppose to do and fails to do so. If someone wants a phone without features such as texting and web then perhaps this phone would be a consideration, yet even then I don't recommend it. I have sent this product back and ordered my brand of choice.

Reviews.Title: Es un telefono muy comodo y me encanto!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gecas
Reviews.Content: Me encanta mi teléfono, es muy cómodo para andarlo me encanta su tamaño, la pantalla es muy sensible funciona por calor (lo que percibe es la huella de los dedos y no otros objetos como las púas o las uñas) no me gusto mucho el sistema operativo original pero fue súper fácil actualizarlo y muy rápido!Toma fotos grandiosas y videos muy claros, con respecto a esto lo único que no me agrado es que la cámara no tiene zoom pero no me molesta tanto ya que siempre ando mi cámara.Si lo utilizo para nada mas lo necesario la batería dura hasta 3 días, pero si lo uso para música y con el wifi y otros accesorios encendidos tengo que cargarlo diaria mente. Me llamo mucho la atención que la batería la trae integrada al teléfono  y trae una tarjeta de memoria de 2G y eso en ningún lado lo decía!No me arrepiento de la compra que realice es excelente lo recomiendo!

Reviews.Title: Nice cellphone, however bluetooth sucks
Reviews.Author: Carlos Chacon "Charles"
Reviews.Content: the product itself is wonderful but the bluetooth sucks, you have to download a third party program, which is very complicated to use in orderto transfer or receive files, apart from this particular problem I would recommend to buy one.

Reviews.Title: no sirve
Reviews.Author: ibis
Reviews.Content: me extraña que sony ericsson, que es mi marca favorita de celular haya fabricado un telefono como este , no era lo que yo esperaba, la bateria del celular esta integrada en el mismo telefono o sea que es una sola pieza si la bateria se daña tiene que descartar el telefono pues no se le puede remover la misma como a los demas celulares, no lo recomiendo.lo compre y lo devolvi y el sonido es muy pobre. NO LO COMPREN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: SONY LADRON
Reviews.Author: Luis Medina
Reviews.Content: Es una estafa de primera categoria.. estos son unos ladrones no compren estas porquerias de SONY...A las 3 semanas de haber comprado el equipo me llega un mensaje a mi e-mail (desbloquee su equipo)...???.---Hasta ahi todo bien, cual es mi sorpresa que ahora que me llega el cell (tarde) tengo que pagar para desbloquearlo.. q tipo de estafa es esta? El cell dice claramente UNLOCKED e INTERNATIONAL VERSION... Es decir q no tengo para que diablos desbloquearlo.. pero ahora SONY me quiere cobrar $55 extras para poder usar mi equipo, es un robo maldita sea...Además el equipo esta defectuoso, le pongo una sim y el equipo no prende.. es decir que esta ocasionando corto???..-... He intentado con una SIM CLARO... mañana usara una SIM MOVISTAR, pero si el problema persiste significa que el equipo está dañado, tanto esperar para esto.. encima que me quieran cobrar más,... q sinverguenzeria es esta??. Espero lean la reseña para que nadie compre más a SONY un equipo (Si hubieran dicho en el anuncio que habia que pagar para desbloquear no lo compro... como les digo a las 3 semanas me llega la sorpresita y el equipo luego de 1 mes)

Reviews.Title: Purchase of equipment Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini E10i Unlocked
Reviews.Author: Maybeth
Reviews.Content: Despite being my first experience, I can say it was excellent, very good team, all arrived in good condition, fast and efficient operation.

Reviews.Title: Facebook application
Reviews.Author: Star
Reviews.Content: Can somebody tell mi how to log out from facebook after i sign in, because i can`t get out from facebook ..... :/

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850/900/1800/1900, HSDPA 900/2100
Screen: 2.55 inches, 240 x 320 pixels, TFT capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors, Scratch-resistant surface, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, Timescape UI
Camera: 5 MP, 2560х1920 pixels, autofocus, LED flash. Video: VGA@30fps, video light
Platform: Android OS 1.6. CPU: Qualcomm MSM7227 600MHz. Internal Memory: 128MB. External Memory: microSD, up to 16GB
MP4/H.263/H.264/WMV player, MP3/eAAC+/WMA/WAV player, YouTube, Calendar, Google Talk, Document viewer, TrackID music recognition, GPS with A-GPS support, Stereo FM radio with RDS, MMS, Email, Push email
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini E10i Unlocked Smartphone with 5 MP Camera, Android OS, gps navigation, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth--International Version with Warranty (Pearl White/Pink)
